<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/v5/repos/{owner}/{repo}/git/trees/{sha}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>





<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"owner","in":"path","description":"仓库所属空间地址(企业、组织或个人的地址path)","required":true,"example":"","schema":{"type":"string"}},{"name":"repo","in":"path","description":"仓库路径(path)","required":true,"example":"","schema":{"type":"string"}},{"name":"sha","in":"path","description":"可以是分支名(main)、Commit或者目录Tree的SHA值","required":true,"example":"","schema":{"type":"string"}},{"name":"recursive","in":"query","description":"赋值为1递归获取目录","required":false,"schema":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"}},{"name":"page","in":"query","description":"当前的页码","required":false,"schema":{"type":"integer","format":"int32","default":1}},{"name":"per_page","in":"query","description":"每页的数量，最大为 100","required":false,"schema":{"type":"integer","format":"int32","default":20}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"OK","content":{"*/*":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"tree":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"content":{"type":"string"},"type":{"type":"string"},"size":{"type":"string"},"name":{"type":"string"},"path":{"type":"string"},"mode":{"type":"string"},"sha":{"type":"string"},"url":{"type":"string"},"html_url":{"type":"string"},"download_url":{"type":"string"},"md5":{"type":"string"},"get_links":{"type":"object","properties":{"self":{"type":"string"},"html":{"type":"string"}},"title":"Links"}},"title":"ProjectFileResp"}},"sha":{"type":"string"}},"title":"RepoPathTreeResp"}}},"headers":{}}}}
>
